title: Which font is uset in this logo?
content:
Folks,  
I am new here, and I need to know which font is used in this logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gth\_logo\_web.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090511044245/http:/typophile.com/files/gth_logo_web.jpg) | 13.7 KB |
author: pitchweis

comments.content:
Looks like Futura Condensed to me.

BTW: Hi, and welcome to Typophile! :)
